named-query.name: XXAuthSession.getUserLoggedIn
named-query.query: SELECT count(obj),function('DATE',obj.authTime) as dateAuth FROM XXAuthSession obj GROUP BY dateAuth

named-query.name: XXAuthSession.getAuthSessionBySessionId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXAuthSession obj WHERE obj.extSessionId = :sessionId

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByEmailAddress
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUser obj WHERE obj.emailAddress = :emailAddress

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByLoginId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUser obj WHERE obj.loginId = :loginId

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByPublicScreenName
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUser obj WHERE obj.publicScreenName = :publicScreenName

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByRole
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUser obj, XXPortalUserRole role WHERE obj.id = role.userId and role.userRole = :userRole

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.getUserAddedReport
named-query.query: SELECT count(obj), function('DATE',obj.createTime) as createDate FROM XXPortalUser obj GROUP BY createDate

named-query.name: XXPortalUserRole.findByRoleUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUserRole obj WHERE obj.userId = :userId and obj.userRole = :userRole

named-query.name: XXPortalUserRole.findByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUserRole obj WHERE obj.userId = :userId

named-query.name: XXPortalUserRole.findByParentId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPortalUserRole obj WHERE obj.userId = :parentId

named-query.name: XXAsset.findByAssetName
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXAsset obj WHERE obj.name = :name AND obj.activeStatus != :status

named-query.name: XXAuditMap.findByResourceId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXAuditMap obj WHERE obj.resourceId = :resourceId

named-query.name: XXGroup.findByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroup obj, XXGroupUser groupUser WHERE obj.id = groupUser.parentGroupId and groupUser.userId = :userId

named-query.name: XXPermMap.findByResourceId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXPermMap obj WHERE obj.resourceId = :resourceId

named-query.name: XXResource.findUpdatedResourcesByAssetId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.assetId = :assetId AND obj.updateTime > :lastUpdated

named-query.name: XXResource.findUpdatedResourcesByAssetName
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj, XXAsset xAsset WHERE obj.assetId = xAsset.id AND xAsset.name = :assetName AND obj.updateTime > :lastUpdated

named-query.name: XXResource.findByAssetId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.assetId = :assetId

named-query.name: XXResource.findByAssetType
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj, XXAsset xxAsset WHERE xxAsset.id = obj.assetId and xxAsset.assetType = :assetType

named-query.name: XXResource.findByResourceName
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.name = :name

named-query.name: XXResource.findByResourceNameAndAssetIdAndRecursiveFlag
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.name like :name and obj.assetId=:assetId and obj.isRecursive=:isRecursive

named-query.name: XXResource.findByResourceNameAndAssetIdAndResourceType
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.name like :name and obj.assetId=:assetId and obj.resourceType=:resourceType

named-query.name: XXResource.getMaxUpdateTimeForAssetName
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(obj.updateTime) FROM XXResource obj, XXAsset xAsset WHERE obj.assetId = xAsset.id AND xAsset.name = :assetName

named-query.name: XXResource.findByAssetIdAndResourceStatus
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXResource obj WHERE obj.assetId = :assetId and obj.resourceStatus = :resourceStatus

named-query.name: XXUser.findByUserName
named-query.query: SELECT Obj FROM XXUser obj WHERE obj.name=:name

named-query.name: XXGroup.findByGroupName
named-query.query: SELECT Obj FROM XXGroup obj WHERE obj.name=:name

named-query.name: XXGroupUser.deleteByGroupIdAndUserId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM XXGroupUser obj WHERE obj.parentGroupId=:parentGroupId AND obj.userId=:userId

named-query.name: XXGroupUser.findByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupUser obj WHERE obj.userId=:userId

named-query.name: XXGroupUser.findGroupIdListByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj.parentGroupId FROM XXGroupUser obj WHERE obj.userId=:xUserId

named-query.name: XXGroupUser.findGroupNamesByUserName
named-query.query: SELECT obj.name FROM XXGroup obj WHERE obj.id IN (SELECT gu.parentGroupId FROM XXGroupUser gu, XXUser u WHERE gu.userId = u.id AND u.name=:userName)

named-query.name: XXGroupUser.findByGroupId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupUser obj WHERE obj.parentGroupId=:groupId

named-query.name: XXGroupUser.findByGroupNameAndUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupUser obj WHERE obj.name=:groupName AND obj.userId=:userId

named-query.name: XXTrxLog.findByTrxId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXTrxLog obj WHERE obj.transactionId = :transactionId

named-query.name: XXUser.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj.name from XXUser obj, XXPolicyItemUserPerm polItemUser where polItemUser.policyItemId = :polItemId and polItemUser.userId = obj.id

named-query.name: XXUser.findByPortalUserId
named-query.query: select obj from XXUser obj, XXPortalUser portalUser where portalUser.id = :portalUserId and obj.name = portalUser.loginId

named-query.name: XXGroup.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj.name from XXGroup obj, XXPolicyItemGroupPerm polItemGrp where polItemGrp.policyItemId = :polItemId and polItemGrp.groupId = obj.id

named-query.name: XXPolicyItem.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItem obj where obj.policyId = :policyId order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXPolicyItem.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItem obj where obj.policyId in (select policy.id from XXPolicy policy where policy.service = :serviceId) order by obj.policyId, obj.id

named-query.name: XXPolicy.findByNameAndServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicy obj where obj.name = :polName and obj.service = :serviceId order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXPolicy.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicy obj where obj.service = :serviceId order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXPolicy.getMaxIdOfXXPolicy
named-query.query: select MAX(obj.id) from XXPolicy obj

named-query.name: XXPolicy.findByResourceSignatureByPolicyStatus
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicy obj, XXService xSvc where obj.service = xSvc.id and obj.resourceSignature = :resSignature and xSvc.name = :serviceName and obj.isEnabled = :isPolicyEnabled

named-query.name: XXPolicy.findByResourceSignature
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicy obj, XXService xSvc where obj.service = xSvc.id and obj.resourceSignature = :resSignature and xSvc.name = :serviceName

named-query.name: XXPolicy.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicy obj, XXService svc where obj.service = svc.id and svc.type = :serviceDefId

named-query.name: XXServiceDef.findByName
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceDef obj where obj.name = :name

named-query.name: XXServiceDef.getMaxIdOfXXServiceDef
named-query.query: select MAX(obj.id) from XXServiceDef obj

named-query.name: XXResourceDef.findByNameAndDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXResourceDef obj where obj.name = :name and obj.defId = :defId order by obj.level

named-query.name: XXResourceDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXResourceDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId order by obj.level

named-query.name: XXResourceDef.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXResourceDef obj, XXPolicy xPol, XXServiceDef xSvcDef, XXService xSvc where obj.defId = xSvcDef.id and xSvcDef.id = xSvc.type and xSvc.id = xPol.service and xPol.id = :policyId order by obj.level

named-query.name: XXResourceDef.findByNameAndPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXResourceDef obj, XXPolicy xPol, XXServiceDef xSvcDef, XXService xSvc where obj.defId = xSvcDef.id and xSvcDef.id = xSvc.type and xSvc.id = xPol.service and xPol.id = :policyId and obj.name = :name order by obj.level

named-query.name: XXResourceDef.findByParentResId
named-query.query: select obj from XXResourceDef obj where obj.parent = :parentId

named-query.name: XXAccessTypeDefGrants.findImpliedGrantsByATDId
named-query.query: select obj.impliedGrant from XXAccessTypeDefGrants obj where obj.atdId = :atdId

named-query.name: XXAccessTypeDefGrants.findByNameAndATDId
named-query.query: select obj from XXAccessTypeDefGrants obj where obj.impliedGrant = :name and obj.atdId = :atdId

named-query.name: XXAccessTypeDefGrants.findByATDId
named-query.query: select obj from XXAccessTypeDefGrants obj where obj.atdId = :atdId

named-query.name: XXEnumElementDef.findByEnumDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXEnumElementDef obj where obj.enumDefId = :enumDefId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXServiceConfigDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceConfigDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXServiceConfigDef.findByServiceDefName
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceConfigDef obj, XXServiceDef svcDef where obj.defId = svcDef.id and svcDef.name = :serviceDef order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXAccessTypeDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXAccessTypeDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXAccessTypeDef.findByNameAndServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXAccessTypeDef obj, XXService xSvc where obj.name = :name and xSvc.id = :serviceId and obj.defId = xSvc.type

named-query.name: XXPolicyConditionDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyConditionDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyConditionDef.findByServiceDefIdAndName
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyConditionDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId and obj.name = :name order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyConditionDef.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyConditionDef obj, XXPolicyItemCondition xPolItemCond where xPolItemCond.policyItemId = :polItemId and obj.id = xPolItemCond.type order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyConditionDef.findByPolicyItemIdAndName
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyConditionDef obj, XXPolicyItemCondition xPolItemCond where xPolItemCond.policyItemId = :polItemId and obj.name = :name and obj.id = xPolItemCond.type order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXContextEnricherDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXContextEnricherDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXContextEnricherDef.findByServiceDefIdAndName
named-query.query: select obj from XXContextEnricherDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId and obj.name = :name order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXEnumDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXEnumDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId

named-query.name: XXDataMaskTypeDef.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXDataMaskTypeDef obj where obj.defId = :serviceDefId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXDataMaskTypeDef.findByNameAndServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXDataMaskTypeDef obj, XXService xSvc where obj.name = :name and xSvc.id = :serviceId and obj.defId = xSvc.type

named-query.name: XXServiceConfigMap.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceConfigMap obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId

named-query.name: XXServiceConfigMap.findByServiceAndConfigKey
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceConfigMap obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId and obj.configKey = :configKey

named-query.name: XXServiceConfigMap.findByServiceNameAndConfigKey
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceConfigMap obj, XXService xSvc where xSvc.name = :name and xSvc.id=obj.serviceId and obj.configKey = :configKey

named-query.name: XXService.findByName
named-query.query: select obj from XXService obj where obj.name = :name

named-query.name: XXService.getMaxIdOfXXService
named-query.query: select MAX(obj.id) from XXService obj

named-query.name: XXService.findByServiceDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXService obj where obj.type = :serviceDefId

named-query.name: XXService.findByTagServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXService obj where obj.tagService = :tagServiceId

named-query.name: XXService.findAssociatedTagService
named-query.query: select obj from XXService obj where obj.name = :serviceName and obj.tagService is NOT null and exists (select tagService from XXService tagService where obj.tagService = tagService.id and tagService.isEnabled = TRUE)

named-query.name: XXService.getAllServicesWithTagService
named-query.query: select obj from XXService obj where obj.tagService is NOT null and exists (select tagService from XXService tagService where obj.tagService = tagService.id and tagService.isEnabled = TRUE)

named-query.name: XXServiceVersionInfo.findByServiceName
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceVersionInfo obj, XXService service where obj.serviceId = service.id and service.name = :serviceName

named-query.name: XXServiceVersionInfo.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceVersionInfo obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId

named-query.name: XXServiceVersionInfo.getAllWithServiceNames
named-query.query: select obj, service.name from XXServiceVersionInfo obj, XXService service where obj.serviceId = service.id

named-query.name: XXServiceVersionInfo.findByServiceResourceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceVersionInfo obj where obj.serviceId in (select res.serviceId from XXServiceResource res where res.id = :resourceId)

named-query.name: XXServiceVersionInfo.findByTagId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceVersionInfo obj where obj.serviceId in (select res.serviceId from XXServiceResource res, XXTagResourceMap tagRes where res.id = tagRes.resourceId and tagRes.tagId = :tagId)

named-query.name: XXServiceVersionInfo.findByTagDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceVersionInfo obj where obj.serviceId in (select res.serviceId from XXServiceResource res, XXTagResourceMap tagRes, XXTag tag where res.id = tagRes.resourceId and tagRes.tagId = tag.id and tag.type = :tagDefId)

named-query.name: XXPolicyResource.findByResDefIdAndPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyResource obj where obj.policyId = :polId and obj.resDefId = :resDefId

named-query.name: XXPolicyResource.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyResource obj where obj.policyId = :policyId order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXPolicyResource.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyResource obj where obj.policyId in (select policy.id from XXPolicy policy where policy.service = :serviceId) order by obj.policyId, obj.id

named-query.name: XXPolicyResource.findByResDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyResource obj where obj.resDefId = :resDefId

named-query.name: XXPolicyResourceMap.findByPolicyResId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyResourceMap obj where obj.resourceId = :polResId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyResourceMap.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyResourceMap obj, XXPolicyResource res where obj.resourceId = res.id and res.policyId = :policyId order by obj.resourceId, obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyResourceMap.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyResourceMap obj, XXPolicyResource res where obj.resourceId = res.id and res.policyId in (select policy.id from XXPolicy policy where policy.service = :serviceId) order by res.policyId, obj.resourceId, obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemAccess.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemAccess obj where obj.policyItemId = :polItemId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemAccess.findByType
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemAccess obj where obj.type = :type

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemAccess.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemAccess obj, XXPolicyItem item where obj.policyItemId = item.id and item.policyId = :policyId order by obj.policyItemId, obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemAccess.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemAccess obj, XXPolicyItem item where obj.policyItemId = item.id and item.policyId in (select policy.id from XXPolicy policy where policy.service = :serviceId) order by item.policyId, obj.policyItemId, obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemCondition.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemCondition obj where obj.policyItemId = :polItemId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemCondition.findByPolicyItemAndDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemCondition obj where obj.policyItemId = :polItemId and obj.type = :polCondDefId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemCondition.findByPolicyConditionDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemCondition obj where obj.type = :polCondDefId

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemCondition.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemCondition obj, XXPolicyItem item where obj.policyItemId = item.id and item.policyId = :policyId order by obj.policyItemId, obj.type, obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemCondition.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemCondition obj, XXPolicyItem item where obj.policyItemId = item.id and item.policyId in (select policy.id from XXPolicy policy where policy.service = :serviceId) order by item.policyId, obj.policyItemId, obj.type, obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemGroupPerm.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemGroupPerm obj where obj.policyItemId = :polItemId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemGroupPerm.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemGroupPerm obj, XXPolicyItem item where obj.policyItemId = item.id and item.policyId = :policyId order by obj.policyItemId, obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemGroupPerm.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemGroupPerm obj, XXPolicyItem item where obj.policyItemId = item.id and item.policyId in (select policy.id from XXPolicy policy where policy.service = :serviceId) order by item.policyId, obj.policyItemId, obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemUserPerm.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemUserPerm obj where obj.policyItemId = :polItemId order by obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemUserPerm.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemUserPerm obj, XXPolicyItem item where obj.policyItemId = item.id and item.policyId = :policyId order by obj.policyItemId, obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemUserPerm.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemUserPerm obj, XXPolicyItem item where obj.policyItemId = item.id and item.policyId in (select policy.id from XXPolicy policy where policy.service = :serviceId) order by item.policyId, obj.policyItemId, obj.order

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemDataMaskInfo.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemDataMaskInfo obj where obj.policyItemId = :polItemId

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemDataMaskInfo.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemDataMaskInfo obj, XXPolicyItem item where obj.policyItemId = item.id and item.policyId = :policyId order by obj.policyItemId

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemDataMaskInfo.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemDataMaskInfo obj, XXPolicyItem item where obj.policyItemId = item.id and item.policyId in (select policy.id from XXPolicy policy where policy.service = :serviceId) order by item.policyId, obj.policyItemId

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemDataMaskInfo.findByType
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemDataMaskInfo obj where obj.type = :type

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemRowFilterInfo.findByPolicyItemId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemRowFilterInfo obj where obj.policyItemId = :polItemId

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemRowFilterInfo.findByPolicyId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemRowFilterInfo obj, XXPolicyItem item where obj.policyItemId = item.id and item.policyId = :policyId order by obj.policyItemId

named-query.name: XXPolicyItemRowFilterInfo.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicyItemRowFilterInfo obj, XXPolicyItem item where obj.policyItemId = item.id and item.policyId in (select policy.id from XXPolicy policy where policy.service = :serviceId) order by item.policyId, obj.policyItemId

named-query.name: XXDataHist.findLatestByObjectClassTypeAndObjectId
named-query.query: select obj from XXDataHist obj where obj.objectId = :objectId and obj.objectClassType = :classType ORDER BY obj.id

named-query.name: XXDataHist.getVersionListOfObject
named-query.query: select obj.version from XXDataHist obj where obj.objectId = :objId and obj.objectClassType = :classType GROUP BY obj.version

named-query.name: XXDataHist.findObjectByVersionNumber
named-query.query: select obj from XXDataHist obj where obj.objectClassType = :classType and obj.objectId = :objId and obj.version = :version

named-query.name: XXTrxLog.findLogForMaxIdOfClassType
named-query.query: select MAX(obj.objectId) from XXTrxLog obj where obj.objectClassType = :classType

named-query.name: XXUserPermission.findByUserPermissionId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXUserPermission obj WHERE obj.userId=:userId

named-query.name: XXUserPermission.findByUserPermissionIdAndIsAllowed
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXUserPermission obj WHERE obj.userId=:userId AND Obj.isAllowed=:isAllowed

named-query.name: XXUserPermission.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXUserPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId=:moduleId AND Obj.isAllowed=:isAllowed

named-query.name: XXUserPermissionUpdates.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXUserPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId=:moduleId

named-query.name: XXUserPermission.deleteByModuleId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM XXUserPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId=:moduleId

named-query.name: XXGroupPermission.findByGroupId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupPermission obj WHERE obj.groupId=:groupId

named-query.name: XXGroupPermission.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId=:moduleId AND Obj.isAllowed=:isAllowed

named-query.name: XXGroupPermissionUpdates.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId=:moduleId AND Obj.isAllowed=:isAllowed

named-query.name: XXGroupPermissionUpdate.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId=:moduleId

named-query.name: XXUserPermission.findByModuleIdAndPortalUserId
named-query.query: SELECT XXUserPermObj FROM XXUserPermission XXUserPermObj WHERE XXUserPermObj.moduleId = :moduleId AND XXUserPermObj.userId =:userId

named-query.name: XXGroupPermission.findByModuleIdAndGroupId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId = :moduleId AND obj.groupId =:groupId

named-query.name: XXGroupPermission.deleteByModuleId
named-query.query: DELETE FROM XXGroupPermission obj WHERE obj.moduleId=:moduleId

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByUserName
named-query.query: SELECT Obj FROM XXPortalUser obj WHERE obj.loginId=:loginId

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findByXUserId
named-query.query: SELECT xxPortalUser FROM XXPortalUser xxPortalUser,XXUser xxUser WHERE xxUser.id=:id and xxPortalUser.loginId=xxUser.name

named-query.name: XXPortalUser.findAllXPortalUser
named-query.query: SELECT xxPortalUser FROM XXPortalUser xxPortalUser

named-query.name: XXModuleDef.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXModuleDef obj WHERE obj.id=:id

named-query.name: XXModuleDef.findByModuleName
named-query.query: SELECT Obj FROM XXModuleDef obj WHERE obj.module=:moduleName

named-query.name: XXModuleDef.findAllAccessibleModulesByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj.module FROM XXModuleDef obj WHERE obj.id in (SELECT userPerm.moduleId FROM XXUserPermission userPerm WHERE userPerm.userId=:portalUserId and userPerm.isAllowed=:isAllowed) OR obj.id in (SELECT grpPerm.moduleId FROM XXGroupPermission grpPerm WHERE grpPerm.groupId IN (SELECT grpUser.parentGroupId FROM XXGroupUser grpUser WHERE grpUser.userId=:xUserId) and grpPerm.isAllowed=:isAllowed)

named-query.name: XXModuleDef.findAccessibleModulesByGroupId
named-query.query: select obj.module from XXModuleDef obj, XXGroupPermission grpPerm where grpPerm.groupId IN :grpIdList and grpPerm.moduleId = obj.id and grpPerm.isAllowed = :isAllowed

named-query.name: XXGroupPermission.findByVXPoratUserId
named-query.query: SELECT distinct gmp FROM XXGroupUser xgu,XXUser xu,XXGroupPermission gmp, XXPortalUser xpu WHERE xu.name=xpu.loginId and xu.id=xgu.userId and xgu.parentGroupId=gmp.groupId and xpu.id=:userId and gmp.isAllowed=:isAllowed

named-query.name: XXServiceResourceElement.findByResourceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResourceElement obj where obj.resourceId = :resourceId order by obj.resourceId, obj.id

named-query.name: XXServiceResourceElement.findTaggedResourcesInServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResourceElement obj where obj.resourceId in (select serviceresource.id from XXServiceResource serviceresource where serviceresource.serviceId = :serviceId and serviceresource.id in (select tagResMap.resourceId from XXTagResourceMap tagResMap) ) order by obj.resourceId, obj.id

named-query.name: XXServiceResourceElement.findForServicePlugin
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResourceElement obj where obj.resourceId in (select serviceRes.id from XXServiceResource serviceRes, XXService service where service.id = :serviceId and service.tagService is not null and serviceRes.serviceId = service.id and serviceRes.id in (select tagResMap.resourceId from XXTagResourceMap tagResMap, XXTag tag, XXTagDef tagDef where tagResMap.tagId = tag.id and tag.type = tagDef.id and tagDef.name in (select policyResMap.value from XXPolicyResourceMap policyResMap, XXPolicyResource policyRes, XXPolicy policy where policy.service = service.tagService and policy.isEnabled = TRUE and policyRes.policyId = policy.id and policyResMap.resourceId = policyRes.id) ) ) order by obj.resourceId, obj.id

named-query.name: XXServiceResourceElement.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResourceElement obj where obj.resourceId in (select serviceresource.id from XXServiceResource serviceresource where serviceresource.serviceId = :serviceId) order by obj.resourceId, obj.id

named-query.name: XXServiceResourceElementValue.findByResElementId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResourceElementValue obj where obj.resElementId = :resElementId

named-query.name: XXServiceResourceElementValue.findValuesByResElementId
named-query.query: select obj.value from XXServiceResourceElementValue obj where obj.resElementId = :resElementId

named-query.name: XXServiceResourceElementValue.findTaggedResourcesInServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResourceElementValue obj, XXServiceResourceElement resElem where obj.resElementId = resElem.id and resElem.resourceId in (select res.id from XXServiceResource res where res.serviceId = :serviceId and res.id in (select tagResMap.resourceId from XXTagResourceMap tagResMap) ) order by resElem.resourceId, resElem.id

named-query.name: XXServiceResourceElementValue.findForServicePlugin
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResourceElementValue obj, XXServiceResourceElement serviceResElem where obj.resElementId = serviceResElem.id and serviceResElem.resourceId in (select serviceRes.id from XXServiceResource serviceRes, XXService service where service.id = :serviceId and service.tagService is not null and serviceRes.serviceId = service.id and serviceRes.id in (select tagResMap.resourceId from XXTagResourceMap tagResMap, XXTag tag, XXTagDef tagDef where tagResMap.tagId = tag.id and tag.type = tagDef.id and tagDef.name in (select policyResMap.value from XXPolicyResourceMap policyResMap, XXPolicyResource policyRes, XXPolicy policy where policy.service = service.tagService and policy.isEnabled = TRUE and policyRes.policyId = policy.id and policyResMap.resourceId = policyRes.id) ) ) order by serviceResElem.resourceId, serviceResElem.id

named-query.name: XXServiceResourceElementValue.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResourceElementValue obj, XXServiceResourceElement resElem where obj.resElementId = resElem.id and resElem.resourceId in (select res.id from XXServiceResource res where res.serviceId = :serviceId) order by resElem.resourceId, resElem.id

named-query.name: XXServiceResourceElementValue.findByResourceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResourceElementValue obj, XXServiceResourceElement resElem where obj.resElementId = resElem.id and resElem.resourceId = :resourceId order by resElem.resourceId, resElem.id

named-query.name: XXTagResourceMap.findByGuid
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagResourceMap obj where obj.guid = :guid

named-query.name: XXTagResourceMap.findByResourceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagResourceMap obj where obj.resourceId = :resourceId

named-query.name: XXTagResourceMap.findByResourceGuid
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagResourceMap obj, XXServiceResource res where res.guid = :resourceGuid and obj.resourceId = res.id

named-query.name: XXTagResourceMap.findByTagId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagResourceMap obj where obj.tagId = :tagId

named-query.name: XXTagResourceMap.findByTagGuid
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagResourceMap obj, XXTag tag where tag.guid = :tagGuid and obj.tagId = tag.id

named-query.name: XXTagResourceMap.findByTagAndResourceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagResourceMap obj where obj.resourceId = :resourceId and obj.tagId = :tagId

named-query.name: XXTagResourceMap.findByTagAndResourceGuid
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagResourceMap obj, XXTag tag, XXServiceResource res where tag.guid = :tagGuid and res.guid = :resourceGuid and obj.tagId = tag.id and obj.resourceId = res.id

named-query.name: XXTagResourceMap.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagResourceMap obj, XXServiceResource res where obj.resourceId = res.id and res.serviceId = :serviceId order by obj.resourceId

named-query.name: XXTagResourceMap.findForServicePlugin
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagResourceMap obj, XXService service, XXServiceResource serviceRes where service.id = :serviceId and service.tagService is not null and obj.resourceId = serviceRes.id and serviceRes.serviceId = :serviceId and obj.tagId in (select tag.id from XXTag tag, XXTagDef tagDef where tag.type = tagDef.id and tagDef.name in (select policyResMap.value from XXPolicyResourceMap policyResMap, XXPolicyResource policyRes, XXPolicy policy where policy.service = service.tagService and policy.isEnabled = TRUE and policyRes.policyId = policy.id and policyResMap.resourceId = policyRes.id) ) order by obj.resourceId

named-query.name: XXTagResourceMap.getTagIdsForResourceId
named-query.query: select obj.tagId from XXTagResourceMap obj where obj.resourceId = :resourceId order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXTagDef.findByGuid
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagDef obj where obj.guid = :guid

named-query.name: XXTagDef.findByName
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagDef obj where obj.name = :name

named-query.name: XXTagDef.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagDef obj where obj.id in (select tag.type from XXTag tag, XXTagResourceMap tagRes, XXServiceResource resource where tag.id = tagRes.tagId and tagRes.resourceId = resource.id and resource.serviceId = :serviceId) order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXTagDef.findForServicePlugin
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagDef obj, XXService service where service.id = :serviceId and service.tagService is not null and obj.name in (select policyResMap.value from XXPolicyResourceMap policyResMap, XXPolicyResource policyRes, XXPolicy policy where policy.service = service.tagService and policyRes.policyId = policy.id and policy.isEnabled = TRUE and policyResMap.resourceId = policyRes.id) order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXTagDef.findByResourceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagDef obj where obj.id in (select tag.type from XXTag tag, XXTagResourceMap tagRes where tag.id = tagRes.tagId and tagRes.resourceId = :resourceId) order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXTagDef.getAllNames
named-query.query: select obj.name from XXTagDef obj

named-query.name: XXTagAttributeDef.findByTagDefId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagAttributeDef obj where obj.tagDefId = :tagDefId

named-query.name: XXTagAttributeDef.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagAttributeDef obj where obj.tagDefId in (select tag.type from XXTag tag, XXTagResourceMap tagRes, XXServiceResource resource where tag.id = tagRes.tagId and tagRes.resourceId = resource.id and resource.serviceId = :serviceId) order by obj.tagDefId

named-query.name: XXTagAttributeDef.findForServicePlugin
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagAttributeDef obj where obj.tagDefId in (select tagDef.id from XXTagDef tagDef, XXService service where service.id = :serviceId and service.tagService is not null and tagDef.name in (select policyResMap.value from XXPolicyResourceMap policyResMap, XXPolicyResource policyRes, XXPolicy policy where policy.service = service.tagService and policy.isEnabled = TRUE and policyRes.policyId = policy.id and policyResMap.resourceId = policyRes.id) ) order by obj.tagDefId

named-query.name: XXTagAttributeDef.findByResourceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagAttributeDef obj where obj.tagDefId in (select tag.type from XXTag tag, XXTagResourceMap tagRes where tag.id = tagRes.tagId and tagRes.resourceId = :resourceId) order by obj.tagDefId

named-query.name: XXTag.findByGuid
named-query.query: select obj from XXTag obj where obj.guid = :guid order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXTag.findByName
named-query.query: select obj from XXTag obj, XXTagDef tagDef where obj.type = tagDef.id and tagDef.name = :name

named-query.name: XXTag.findByResourceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTag obj, XXTagResourceMap tagResMap where tagResMap.resourceId = :resourceId and obj.id = tagResMap.tagId order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXTag.findByResourceGuid
named-query.query: select obj from XXTag obj, XXTagResourceMap tagRes, XXServiceResource res where res.guid = :resourceGuid and res.id = tagRes.resourceId and tagRes.tagId = obj.id

named-query.name: XXTag.findTagTypesByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj.name from XXTagDef obj, XXTag tag, XXServiceResource resource, XXTagResourceMap tagRes where obj.id = tag.type and tag.id = tagRes.tagId and tagRes.resourceId = resource.id and resource.serviceId = :serviceId

named-query.name: XXTag.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTag obj where obj.id in (select tagRes.tagId from XXTagResourceMap tagRes, XXServiceResource resource where tagRes.resourceId = resource.id and resource.serviceId = :serviceId) order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXTag.findForServicePlugin
named-query.query: select obj from XXTag obj, XXTagDef tagDef, XXService service where service.id = :serviceId and service.tagService is not null and obj.type = tagDef.id and tagDef.name in (select policyResMap.value from XXPolicyResourceMap policyResMap, XXPolicyResource policyRes, XXPolicy policy where policy.service = service.tagService and policy.isEnabled = TRUE and policyRes.policyId = policy.id and policyResMap.resourceId = policyRes.id) order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXTag.findByServiceIdAndOwner
named-query.query: select obj from XXTag obj where obj.owner = :owner and obj.id in (select tagRes.tagId from XXTagResourceMap tagRes, XXServiceResource resource where tagRes.resourceId = resource.id and resource.serviceId = :serviceId) order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXTagAttribute.findByTagId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagAttribute obj where obj.tagId = :tagId

named-query.name: XXTagAttribute.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagAttribute obj where obj.tagId in (select tagRes.tagId from XXTagResourceMap tagRes, XXServiceResource resource where tagRes.resourceId = resource.id and resource.serviceId = :serviceId) order by obj.tagId

named-query.name: XXTagAttribute.findByServiceIdAndOwner
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagAttribute obj where obj.tagId in (select tag.id from XXTag tag where tag.owner = :owner and tag.id in (select tagRes.tagId from XXTagResourceMap tagRes, XXServiceResource resource where tagRes.resourceId = resource.id and resource.serviceId = :serviceId) ) order by obj.tagId

named-query.name: XXTagAttribute.findByResourceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagAttribute obj where obj.tagId in (select tagRes.tagId from XXTagResourceMap tagRes where tagRes.resourceId = :resourceId) order by obj.tagId

named-query.name: XXTagAttribute.findForServicePlugin
named-query.query: select obj from XXTagAttribute obj where obj.tagId in (select tag.id from XXTag tag, XXTagDef tagDef, XXService service where service.id = :serviceId and service.tagService is not null and tag.type = tagDef.id and tagDef.name in (select policyResMap.value from XXPolicyResourceMap policyResMap, XXPolicyResource policyRes, XXPolicy policy where policy.service = service.tagService and policy.isEnabled = TRUE and policyRes.policyId = policy.id and policyResMap.resourceId = policyRes.id) ) order by obj.tagId

named-query.name: XXServiceResource.findByGuid
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResource obj where obj.guid = :guid

named-query.name: XXServiceResource.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResource obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXServiceResource.findTaggedResourcesInServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResource obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId and obj.id in (select tagResMap.resourceId from XXTagResourceMap tagResMap) order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXServiceResource.countTaggedResourcesInServiceId
named-query.query: select count(obj.id) from XXServiceResource obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId and obj.id in (select tagResMap.resourceId from XXTagResourceMap tagResMap)

named-query.name: XXServiceResource.findForServicePlugin
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResource obj, XXService service where service.id = :serviceId and service.tagService is not null and obj.serviceId = service.id and obj.id in (select tagResMap.resourceId from XXTagResourceMap tagResMap, XXTag tag, XXTagDef tagDef where tagResMap.tagId = tag.id and tag.type = tagDef.id and tagDef.name in (select policyResMap.value from XXPolicyResourceMap policyResMap, XXPolicyResource policyRes, XXPolicy policy where policy.service = service.tagService and policy.isEnabled = TRUE and policyRes.policyId = policy.id and policyResMap.resourceId = policyRes.id) ) order by obj.id

named-query.name: XXServiceResource.findByServiceAndResourceSignature
named-query.query: select obj from XXServiceResource obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId and obj.resourceSignature = :resourceSignature

named-query.name: XXServiceResource.findServiceResourceGuidsInServiceId
named-query.query: select obj.guid from XXServiceResource obj where obj.serviceId = :serviceId

named-query.name: XXTrxLog.getMaxIdOfXXTrxLog
named-query.query: select max(obj.id) from XXTrxLog obj

named-query.name: XXTrxLog.updateLogAttr
named-query.query: UPDATE XXTrxLog obj SET obj.newValue = :newValue WHERE obj.id > :idFrom AND obj.id < :idTo AND obj.objectClassType = :objClassType AND obj.attributeName = :attrName

named-query.name: XXAuthSession.getAuthSessionByUserId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXAuthSession obj WHERE obj.userId = :userId

named-query.name: XXGroupGroup.findByGroupId
named-query.query: SELECT obj FROM XXGroupGroup obj WHERE obj.groupId = :groupId or obj.parentGroupId = :parentGroupId

named-query.name: XXPolicy.findByUserId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicy obj, XXPolicyItem polItem,XXPolicyItemUserPerm polItemUserPerm where obj.id = polItem.policyId and polItem.id = polItemUserPerm.policyItemId and polItemUserPerm.userId = :userId

named-query.name: XXPolicy.findByGroupId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPolicy obj, XXPolicyItem polItem,XXPolicyItemGroupPerm polItemGroupPerm where obj.id = polItem.policyId and polItem.id = polItemGroupPerm.policyItemId and polItemGroupPerm.groupId = :groupId

named-query.name: XXAccessAudit.getMaxIdOfXXAccessAudit
named-query.query: select max(obj.id) from XXAccessAudit obj

named-query.name: XXAccessAuditV4.getByIdRangeV4
named-query.query: select obj from XXAccessAuditV4 obj WHERE obj.id > :idFrom AND obj.id < :idTo

named-query.name: XXAccessAuditV5.getByIdRangeV5
named-query.query: select obj from XXAccessAuditV5 obj WHERE obj.id > :idFrom AND obj.id < :idTo

named-query.name: XXAccessAudit.getByIdRangeV6
named-query.query: select obj from XXAccessAudit obj WHERE obj.id > :idFrom AND obj.id < :idTo

named-query.name: XXDataHist.findLatestByObjectClassTypeAndObjectIdAndEventTime
named-query.query: select obj from XXDataHist obj where obj.objectId = :objectId and obj.objectClassType = :classType and obj.createTime <= :createTime ORDER BY obj.id DESC

named-query.name: XXPortalUserRole.findXPortalUserRolebyXPortalUserId
named-query.query: select obj.userRole from XXPortalUserRole obj where obj.userId = :userId

named-query.name: XXPluginInfo.find
named-query.query: select obj from XXPluginInfo obj where obj.serviceName = :serviceName and obj.appType = :appType and obj.hostName = :hostName

named-query.name: XXPluginInfo.findByServiceName
named-query.query: select obj from XXPluginInfo obj where obj.serviceName = :serviceName

named-query.name: XXPluginInfo.findByServiceId
named-query.query: select obj from XXPluginInfo obj, XXService service where obj.serviceName = service.name and service.id = :serviceId

named-query.name: XXPluginInfo.findByServiceAndHostName
named-query.query: select obj from XXPluginInfo obj where obj.serviceName = :serviceName and obj.hostName = :hostName
